name: Maiar Kart Racing Time Trial Demo
name_original: Maiar Kart Racing Time Trial Demo
description:
Welcome to the Maiar Kart Time Trial Demo!

Maiar Kart Racing is a throwback to arcade racers with a fresh coat of paint using Unreal Engine 5. This is a pre-alpha for our game in development.  Please feel free to provide feedback and check out our links below for more information.

linktr.ee/maiarkartracing
